name: Error Handling and Recovery with Data Validation

steps.name: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"
Given I execute API request "get_api" with parameters
Then the response status should be 404
When I execute API request "get_api" with parameters
Then the response status should be 200
And the response should contain field "name"
When I execute API request "post_api" with parameters
Then the response status should be 201
And the response field "title" should contain "Recovery Post for"
And the response field "userId" should equal the previous response field "id"

fullName: Complex Integration Testing with Multi-Step Data Validation: Error Handling and Recovery with Data Validation

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Complex Integration Testing with Multi-Step Data Validation
